section.title: Backward compatibility summary
section.para:
Protocol changes since GT version previousversion
The Aggregator Framework is affected by the Java WS Core protocol changes (see the Java WS Core Release Notes for details)

API changes since GT version previousversion
None. Aggregator sources and execution information providers written for GT version previousversion should continue to work in this version.

Schema changes since GT version previousversion
See the Java WS Core Release Notes.
